verbose_text: In contrast, in the presence of ATM or CLA, the RLU increase for lower inoculation densities starts earlier, since both compounds induce competence; however, the slope of light production is less steep, indicating reduced synchronization of competence throughout the population (XREF_FIG).
evidence: ATM or CLA, the RLU increase for lower inoculation densities starts earlier, since both compounds induce competence
